snippet.title: SD card projects using the PIC microcontroller
snippet.description: SD card projects using the PIC microcontroller / Ibrahim, Dogan PIC Microcontrollers are a favorite in industry and with hobbyists [...] Burlington, MA : Elsevier, 2010. - 571 p.

snippet.title: EPICS for PDAs
snippet.description: EPICS for PDAs / Evans, K With the advent of readily available wireless communications and small hand-held computers, commonly known as personal digital assistants (PDAs), it is interesting to consider using these portable devices to access a control system. We have successfully ported the Experimental Physics and Industrial Control System (EPICS) to Windows CE 3.0 (WCE) for the Pocket PC (PPC), and this paper describes the issues involved. [...] physics/0111040.- 2001 External links: physics/0111040 PDF; Fulltext from SLAC In : 8th International Conference on Accelerator and Large Experimental Physics Control Systems, San Jos√©, CA, USA, 27 - 30 Nov 2001, pp.e-proc. THAP009
